name: Avoid having call function return ignored (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the Methods and Functions containing call function returns that are ignored.
output:
This report lists all the Methods and Functions containing call function returns that are ignored.

This QR provides the following information:
Method and Function full name.
rationale: In PHP ignoring the result of a function indicates that the programmer has made an assumption about this return value. Unfortunately, sometimes this assumption can be wrong and produce unexpected results for the application.
remediation: Modify the source code and always check the return value of functions.
